metadata.title: CVE-2020-6568 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in intent handling in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 85.0.4183.83 allowed a remote attacker to bypassnavigation restrictions via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
